name: OctoDev
tagline: We build apps, without breaking your bank account!
description:
Octodev is a full-stack mobile & web app design and development company. We  deliver amazing applications for startups in any field. We optimize our products at every stage of their development to give our clients maximum value for minimum effort.
When you partner with Octodev, you’re not just hiring a design and development team, you’re hiring a guide that can walk with you through the steps to launching your successful app project.
